channel.title: Running a server 24/7 client crashes need help extending memory process killer
channel.description:
this is what my process killer says is there anything i need to fix so that it dosnt stop popping up on my screen someone please help its d d s v 3 and i cant run the server with auto restart =( it also says program PING is not recognized as an internel or external command uggg
:start PING 1.1.1.1 -n 1 -w 1200000 tskill java start call runner goto start

item.title: Running a server 24/7 client crashes need help extending memory process killer
item.dc:creator: @Honor_Swords Honor Swords
item.description:
@Honor_Swords wrote:

this is what my process killer says is there anything i need to fix so that it dosnt stop popping up on my screen someone please help its d d s v 3 and i cant run the server with auto restart =( it also says program PING is not recognized as an internel or external command uggg

:start
PING 1.1.1.1 -n 1 -w 1200000
tskill java
start call runner
goto start

Read full topic
item.source: Running a server 24/7 client crashes need help extending memory process killer
